title: You Chin Hong
text: You Chin Hong (born 4 June 1941) is a Cambodian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201964%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Lightweight">men's lightweight</a> event at the <a href="1964%20Summer%20Olympics">1964 Summer Olympics</a>. At the 1964 Summer Olympics, he lost in his first fight to <a href="Alex%20Odhiambo">Alex Odhiambo</a> of Uganda.
